resources.string: Shows your current Adventure Sync Egg Distance from Pokémon Go
Pokémon Go Buddy Walk Distance (Galaxy Store)
Shows your current Adventure Sync Buddy Walk Together Distance from Pokémon Go
This Complication requires the Play Store version of Pokémon Go
This Complication requires the Galaxy Store version of Pokémon Go
Set whether to use a static icon
Use a static egg icon rather than the currently incubating type
Use a static walking icon rather than the current buddy
